flawed_nl_solution:
Originally, the houses are 7300+5200=<<7300+5200=12480>>12480 sq. ft. in total.
The smaller house will be expanded by 16000-12480=<<16000-12480=3520>>3520 sq. ft.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12500, not 12480. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
